Class Piece

java.lang.Object
Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cat, Dog
public abstract class Piece extends Object
The Piece class is an abstract class that represents a piece in the game. It contains the common properties and methods for all pieces.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description

    col
    The column position of the piece on the board.

    strength

    symbol

  • Constructor Details

    • Piece

      public Piece(String name, int row, int col, String symbol, String owner, int strength)
      Constructs a Piece object with the given attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the piece.
      row - The row position of the piece.
      col - The column position of the piece.
      symbol - The symbol representing the piece.
      owner - The owner of the piece.
      strength - The strength of the piece.

  • Method Details

    • canMove

      public abstract boolean canMove(int newRow, int newCol, Board board)
      Abstract method to check if a piece can move to a new position.
      Parameters:
      newRow - The new row position.
      newCol - The new column position.
      board - The game board. Pre-condition: The new row and column must be within the board grid. Post-condition: The piece's position is updated to the new row and column.
      Returns:
      true if the piece can move to the new position, false otherwise.

    • move

      public void move(int newRow, int newCol)
      Moves the piece to a new position. Pre-condition: The new row and column must be within the board grid. Post-condition: The piece's position is updated to the new row and column.
      Parameters:
      newRow - The new row position.
      newCol - The new column position.

    • canCapture

      public boolean canCapture(Piece opponent, Board board)
      Checks if the piece can capture another piece.
      Parameters:
      opponent - The piece to capture.
      board - The game board. Pre-condition: The opponent piece must be a valid Piece object. Post-condition: The piece's position is updated to the new row and column.
      Returns:
      true if the piece can capture the opponent piece, false otherwise.

      public String getOwner()
      Gets the piece's owner.

      The owner of the piece.

      public int getRow()
      Gets the piece's row position. Pre-condition: The piece must be on the board.
      Returns:
      The row position of the piece.

    • getCol

      Gets the piece's column position.
      Returns:
      The column position of the piece.

    • isTrapped

      public boolean isTrapped()
      Checks if the piece is trapped.
      Returns:
      True if the piece is trapped, false otherwise.

      public boolean isInLake()
      Checks if the piece is in a lake.
      Returns:
      True if the piece is in a lake, false otherwise.

    • isCaptured

      public boolean isCaptured()
      Checks if the piece is captured.
      Returns:
      True if the piece is captured, false otherwise.
